EmailTemplate.name: ES-2017-2-28-February Partner Newsletter.March 2017 Newsletter
EmailTemplate.subject: March Partner Newsletter
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
In This Issue:
- Partner Promotion: Hardware Refresh - Upcoming Training: ACE Certification - Quarterly Town Hall: What You Missed! - AWS Outage + Turbonomic's Take
Partner Promotion: Hardware Refresh With today's hardware refresh cycle averaging between three and five years, IT organizations are constantly thinking about their next system updates/upgrades. By introducing Turbonomic to your customers who are in the midst of a hardware refresh cycle, you are enabling these organizations to assure performance and maximize efficiency.
We are excited to announce that our Hardware Refresh Platinum Partner Promotion will run from February 21, 2017 - April 31, 2017. During this time, Platinum Partners that introduce Turbonomic to a prospect who is undergoing, or planning to undergo, a hardware refresh project, will be eligible for an additional 15% discount on their Turbonomic transfer price. Simply register your opportunity in the Turbonomic Deal Registration Portal with the code "TurboHardware"!
On our Partner Promotion Page <[[https://greencircle.vmturbo.com/docs/DOC-4416]]>, you will find hardware refresh collateral that you can leverage to enable you and your teams - from blog posts, to webinars, to case studies - we encourage you to share this collateral on your platforms with your customers. Upcoming Training: ACE Certification
Turbonomic's ACE Training program signifies the mastery of Turbonomic technology and its autonomic control system actions, including knowledge of all dashboards, administration, plan function and reservations, and deployment. To be certified, individuals must complete a two-day course and pass multiple-choice and practical exams. Those who are ACE Certified join a growing community of thought leaders in virtualization and cloud management.
We also believe in the value having partners ACE certified brings to not only our customers and partners, but to us here at Turbonomic as well. Orna Kliger, Senior Director of the Turbonomic Circle of Excellence noted, "We are excited about the increasing number of partners who have earned Turbonomic ACE Certification. They learn how to maximize the value of their investment in our platform, and we gain so much from their perspective."
Find out more about how as a Platinum Partner, you receive an exclusive discount for our upcoming trainings <[[https://greencircle.vmturbo.com/docs/DOC-4428]]>. Quarterly Town Hall: What You Missed!
We held our annual Quarterly Town Hall for our partners last month. During the webinar we made some exciting announcements about our investment into our people and our partners in 2017 along with Gary Reiner, former GE CIO, joining our Board of Directors and opportunities to become ACE Certified at a discounted price! To find out what you missed, watch the webinar here <[[https://greencircle.vmturbo.com/videos/1352]]>! AWS Outage + Turbonomic's Take
Former Lead Solutions Architect at Disney and now Principal Software Architect here at Turbonomic, Steven Haines, sat down with Turbonomic's Eric Wright to better understand a developers reaction to the AWS Outage. Our most recent blog post <[[https://turbonomic.com/blog/on-technology/learning-the-hard-lessons-of-public-cloud-designing-for-when-aws-goes-down/]]> showcases the importance of taking responsibility for designing resilient infrastructure in the IT organizations. Welcome New Customers
Join the Green Circle
Join the Green Circle Today <[[https://greencircle.vmturbo.com/welcome?inviteID=12005]]>! The Green Circle is our online community where you can access all resources, like training materials, industry insight, informative forums and make the most of your partnership with Turbonomic. Questions?
If you have any questions please email us at partners@turbonomic.com <[[mailto:partners@turbonomic.com]]>. We always appreciate your feedback so feel free to send us suggestions on how to improve our partner program or request resources that you would like to see.
